data.title: Mysql Workbench and visual studio connection

data.text: hey I already created my database in Mysql workbench and I don't know how to connect this database with visual(I am using ASP.NET CORE) studio and I already installed Mysql connector but the c# file of the connection string doesn't appear.Please help me out and thank you in advance.
